job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: pstrongTitle Site Reliability EngineerstrongppstrongRemote role Anywhere in the USstrongppstrongFulltimestrongppbrppstrongstrongKey Skills  Cloud Deployment Agile Kubernetes Opensource Python and Elastic SearchppbrppstrongYour Past Experience amp Future Successstrongpp5 to 10 years supporting large scale distributed installationsppExperience operating service in the cloudppstrongExposure to and experience with the following tools Ansible Docker Kubernetes Python Terraform  TerragruntstrongppParticipating in and contributing to agile methodologies and best practicesppArticulate and personable with strong spoken and written language abilitiesppYou engender a sense of mentoring and knowledge sharing amongst your team hence creating a synergistic learning environmentppExperience working and collaborate with a distributed SRE and Engineering teamppSelfmotivated and sensitive about ontime deliveryppstrongJenkins and CICD pipelinestrongppstrongApache Cassandra Apache KafkastrongppstrongOpen Source Software DevelopmentstrongppstrongElasticSearch  OpenDistro  OpenSearchstrongppstrongHashiCorp Vaultstrongp
